Text:
function ERI_EP04_16()
    --.転-2【12月第1週】「目玉焼きなら簡単だと思ってました」
    SaveData.Title = "目玉焼きなら簡単だと思ってました"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    MSG([[ When I woke up, I was lying on the sofa at Akira's house. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1141.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Huh? Where is this...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0627.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You finally came to. During Aikido practice, everyone from the academy carried you all the way to my house after you fainted." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0628.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Really... please be more careful." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0629.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It's only because you have connections with Lira-san and Hiyu-san from the school festival that this hasn't been exposed. Otherwise, it would be very easy for your true identity to be found out, you know?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1142.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "S-sorry... I see. I pushed myself too hard and passed out..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ My memories of practice from the middle onward are hazy. Thinking calmly, I guess I got way too heated. ]])

    MSG([[ My techniques just weren’t working at all, which made me panic. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0630.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Honestly. Now, take your clothes off. I'll apply medicine so you don't get bruises." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1143.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-It's fine... I've been used to being thrown around since way back." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0631.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No, you can't. You're a girl, so you need to have the awareness to take care of your body." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1144.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "But I’m a guy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0632.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Quit your whining and take your clothes off, hey!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1145.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eek!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //エリカのBU消滅
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    --//SE：ポケモンセンターのアレ

    MSG([[ Akira stripped me and rushed me to take a bath, then covered my entire body with an absurd amount of patches, bandages, and ointments. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0683.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Sorry to bother you." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0633.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Alright, hurry up and sit at the table. I’ve already prepared dinner." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0684.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Akira made dinner!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Her words were more shocking than any throw technique, and I almost fainted again. ]])

    MSG([[ I never imagined a day would come when I could eat Akira’s cooking. ]])

    MSG([[ Tears that never came even when my body was hurt welled up, and my eyes grew hot. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0634.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Y-You’re exaggerating. I'm not such a monster to order food from someone in your condition." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0635.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s nothing special, so don’t laugh, okay?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0685.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I definitely won’t laugh. Ah, but... please forgive me if I laugh from being too happy, okay?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0636.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ugh... Just sit down already! You fool of an Itokon super demon!" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira practically kicked my butt to the dining table. ]])

    MSG([[ On the table were wakame miso soup, rice, and a plate with sausages and fried eggs. ]])

    MSG([[ My fried egg was a beautiful soft yolk, perfectly round in shape, but Akira’s was hard-cooked, and the shape was messed up—maybe she messed it up when transferring it to the plate. ]])

    MSG([[ It was very clear she had painstakingly tried to cook my portion as nicely and deliciously as possible. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0686.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I’m... really lucky." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0637.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Geez!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0638.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s just a dinner that ended up like breakfast because I can only cook grilled stuff—so go ahead and make fun of me!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0639.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It actually irritates me way more when you flatter me like that! I won't make it for you again!" ]])

    MSG([[ Embarrassed and pretending to be mad, Akira and I apologized profusely to each other and then said “let’s eat” together. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0687.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "These sausages—did you boil them once before browning? They’re really delicious." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0640.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I just copied what you usually do, Minachin. Seriously, please don’t praise me or I’ll feel miserable." ]])

    MSG([[ I praised her moderately so I wouldn’t upset her and went on eating dinner. ]])

    MSG([[ The miso soup, fried eggs, and sausages were genuinely delicious. I couldn’t believe someone who rarely cooks made them. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira’s sharp mind let her closely observe and learn my usual cooking style and seasoning. ]])

    MSG([[ She tends to be modest, but Akira really is amazing. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0641.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "So, why did you put in so much effort today?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira asked in the middle of our meal. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0688.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Why? ...Because I absolutely want to beat Daria-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0642.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "That’s not all. I kind of felt like Minachin was panicking." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0643.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Are you thinking about something bad all by yourself again?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0689.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh!? Uh, no—well...that is—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0644.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Yep, you’re busted. Speak properly. Otherwise, I’ll upload half-naked photos taken while you were asleep to social media." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0690.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Noooo!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ ...There was no way to evade it. As expected, Akira sees right through everything. ]])

--;吉★　テキスト修正「こととにした」→「ことにした」（2020/02/01 16:52）
    MSG([[ I decided to honestly tell her what I had been thinking about vaguely. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0691.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Actually, if I can beat Daria-san and save my sister Marika, I’m planning to leave Yuriai Private Academy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0645.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Eh? Wh-why? You could just keep going here, couldn’t you?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0646.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You’re enjoying your school life as Erika Ikusa now, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0692.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah, I’m enjoying it. I love both the boys’ and girls’ divisions. But all of that is only possible because I’m keeping an important secret." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0693.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "When I learned about Daria-san’s betrayal, I realized I’m no different in deceiving everyone. I have to properly atone for my sins." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0647.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You and Daria are different. Your lies were necessary to protect someone important." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0694.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Daria-san probably has her own beliefs too. But for us who were deceived, that reason doesn’t matter, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0695.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "No matter the circumstances, I’m still deceiving everyone." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0696.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "So I think I should properly atone for it." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0648.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "So you want to make amends... That’s why you tried so hard today, huh?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0649.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "How clumsy are you?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira stopped eating, fell silent for a while, then continued speaking. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0650.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I understand your feelings. I’ll fully support you to win this Princess Election. However, there is just one condition." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0651.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Hold off on deciding whether to leave the academy until you see how everyone reacts." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0697.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hold off until seeing everyone’s reactions? Wh-why?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0652.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s an absolute must. Whatever the reason, please follow my words." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0698.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "O-Okay." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Akira’s intensity left me no choice but to nod. ]])

    MSG([[ Well, if I reveal that I’ve been lying, it’s inevitable that I’d have to leave the academy. ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t mind. If I can atone to everyone, that’s fine. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0653.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I will definitely lead you to victory." ]])

    MSG([[ At that time, I did not understand the meaning of those reassuring words from Akira. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP04_17")
end
